mb_decrease_lighting_intensity: Move to spot with less lighting
mb_passport_scan_data_page_instructions: Scan the data page of the document
mb_instructions_turn_page_right: Move to the page on the right
mb_instructions_turn_page_left: Move to the page on the left
mb_instructions_turn_page_top: Move to the page on top
mb_glare_detected: Tilt or move document to remove reflection
mb_instructions_photo: Scan the photo side of the document
mb_help_screen_msg3: Try to keep the phone and document still while scanning. Moving either can blur the image and make data on the document unreadable.
mb_help_screen_msg2: Avoid direct harsh light because it reflects from the document and can make parts of the document unreadable. If you can’t read data on the document, it won’t be visible to the camera either.
mb_help_screen_msg1: Make sure you aren’t covering parts of the document with a finger, including the bottom lines. Also, watch out for hologram reflections that go over the document fields.
mb_onboarding_dialog_message: Make sure you keep the document well lit. All document fields should be visible on the camera screen.
mb_back_instructions: Scan the back side of the document
mb_flashlight_warning_message: Watch out for flashlight glare.\nGently move your ID around to avoid it.
mb_document_too_close_to_edge: Move the document from the edge
mb_recognition_timeout_dialog_message: Unable to read the document. Please try again.
mb_unsupported_document_message: Scan the front side of a supported document.
mb_front_instructions: Scan the front side of the document
mb_enable_permission_help_instant_app: Please give the camera permission in the app permission settings.
mb_enable_permission_help: You will now be taken to permission settings where you need to give camera permission to the app.
